name: Broken Engine (Eastvillage)
description:
Oh no, the engines are broken and only works in bursts! Show them how good of a pilot you are anyway.

----

This is a bullet-hell/rhythm game made for Secret Santa Jam 2021.

----

Controls

  • Steer: Aim with mouse
  • Use engine: Right mouse button or SPACE
  • Use weapons: Left mouse button or W

The engine/weapons can only be used every 0.75s so keep the rhythm!

---

Credits

Giftee Prompt: AbstractGallery.

Music: MAUO, https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-theme-1

Music: Tausdei, https://opengameart.org/content/the-last-parsec
